   PORT(
      clk     : IN     std_logic;
      enable  : IN     std_logic;

   );

-- Declarations

END clock_enabler ;

USE ieee.std_logic_arith.all;


ARCHITECTURE struct OF clock_enabler IS

   -- Architecture declarations

   -- Internal signal declarations
   SIGNAL dout : std_logic;



BEGIN

   -- ModuleWare code(v1.12) for instance 'U_1' of 'constval'
   dout <= '0';

   -- ModuleWare code(v1.12) for instance 'U_0' of 'mux'
   u_0combo_proc: PROCESS(dout, clk, enable)
   BEGIN
      CASE enable IS
      WHEN '0' => clk_out <= dout;
      WHEN '1' => clk_out <= clk;
      WHEN OTHERS => clk_out <= 'X';
      END CASE;
